hanzi-su-wiki:
船

Значения

Судно, лодка; корабль

Мнемоника

  • Морское судно 舟 для плавания из моря в реку, где её устье 口 дробиться 八 на рукава. По другой версии — большая лодка 舟, рассчитанная не менее, чем на 8 八 персон 口.

  • "Он сказал 口, что эта лодка 舟 может вместить 8 八 человек."

Варианты

舩

heisig_chinese_memo: A boy floats his toy boat in a gully and imagines it as an immense ship blowing in the wind.
koohiiStory1: A boy floats his toy boat in a gully and imagines it as an immense ship.
koohiiStory2: Aargh, hard to keep this separate from boat. How about this: the phrase "shape up or ship out!" This phrase originally meant that a soldier had better get his act together, or else face being shipped off into a combat zone. Here we see a poor WW-I soldier who has been shipped off to a combat zone. He´s riding in the boat overseas to fight in the trenches (gulley).
jp_example_words:
汽船(きせん): steamship
漁船(ぎょせん): fishing boat
船舶(せんぱく): ship
船(ふね): ship, boat, watercraft, shipping, vessel, steamship
造船(ぞうせん): shipbuilding
風船(ふうせん): balloon
船便(ふなびん): surface mail (ship)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your boat has fins and a mouth! It's still a boat though.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture this boat. It's still a boat, but there is a big mouth on the front and it has fins that it paddles forward with.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This boat belongs to the centaurs (せん). That's probably why you've never seen a boat like it before.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture this mouth and boat with a bunch of centaurs riding in it. Centaurs have a lot more parts than humans, so it makes sense that their boats have more parts (animal ones) too.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 般 (ハン общность, всеобщность).

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A boy floats his toy boat in a gully and imagines it as an immense ship blowing in the wind.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " boat " and "㕣", the original meaning is the main means of transportation on the water. Seen in inscriptions, but incomplete and unclear meaning. "Shuowen": "The boat also. From the boat, the lead saves the sound." Duan Yucai changed to "from the boat to the sound", with a note: "The ancient words on the boat, the modern words on the boat." "Zhuangzi‧ Fisherman": "Yes Fisherman, come off the boat."

" Ship " can mean to be carried by a ship. Tang Hanyu "Pinghuaixi Stele": "The Cai people complained of hunger, and Chuansu went to feed."

" Ship " also means a ship-shaped wine glass. Tang Li Jun "Songchuang Miscellaneous Records": "On the Yinlian Drinking Three Silver Boats, I will make one giant filling."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " boat " and "㕣", the original meaning is the main means of transportation on the water.
humanum_full_description:
從「舟」，「㕣」聲，本義為水上主要運輸工具。見於金文，但辭殘且意義不詳。《說文》：「舟也。从舟，鉛省聲。」 段玉裁改為「从舟㕣聲」，注云：「古言舟，今言船。」《莊子‧漁父》：「有漁夫者，下船而來。」

　　「船」可表示用船運載。唐韓愈〈平淮西碑〉：「蔡人告飢，船粟往哺。」

　　「船」也表示船型的酒杯。唐李濬〈松窗雜錄〉：「上因聯飲三銀船，盡一巨餡。」
humanum_short_description: 從「舟」，「㕣」聲，本義為水上主要運輸工具。

從「 舟 」，「 㕣 」聲，本義為水上主要運輸工具。見於金文，但辭殘且意義不詳。《說文》：「舟也。从舟，鉛省聲。」 段玉裁改為「从舟㕣聲」，注云：「古言舟，今言船。」《莊子‧漁父》：「有漁夫者，下船而來。」 「 船 」可表示用船運載。唐韓愈〈平淮西碑〉：「蔡人告飢，船粟往哺。」 「 船 」也表示船型的酒杯。唐李濬〈松窗雜錄〉：「上因聯飲三銀船，盡一巨餡。」
From the sound of " boat" and " 㕣", the original meaning is the main means of transportation on the water. Seen in inscriptions, but incomplete and unclear meaning. "Shuowen": "The boat also. From the boat, the lead saves the sound." Duan Yucai changed to "from the boat to the sound", with a note: "The ancient words on the boat, the modern words on the boat." "Zhuangzi‧ Fisherman": "Yes Fisherman, come off the boat." " Ship" can mean to be carried by a ship. Tang Hanyu "Pinghuaixi Stele": "The Cai people complained of hunger, and Chuansu went to feed." " Ship" also means a ship-shaped wine glass. Tang Li Jun "Songchuang Miscellaneous Records": "On the Yinlian Drinking Three Silver Boats, I will make one giant filling."

船字的基本解释

船
chuán
水上交通工具：船舶。船只。船舱。船帆。

船字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuán］
［《廣韻》食川切，平仙，船。］
亦作“舩1”。
(1)水上主要运输工具的总称。
(2)用船运载。
(3)指酒杯。
(4)方言，衣纽。

船字的英文翻译

◎ 船
barque, boat, sailer, ship, shipboard, vessel

船字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【舟字部】　船； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1010第17
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?食川切，音膞。【說文】舟也。【世本】共鼓貨狄作船，黃帝臣。【揚子·方言】舟，自關而西謂之船。【釋名】船，循也，循水而行也。【史記·淮隂侯傳】信乃益爲疑兵，陳船欲渡臨晉。【註】索隱曰：劉氏云：陳船，地名，在舊關之西，今之朝邑，非也。案京兆有船司空縣，不名陳船。陳船者，陳列船艘，欲渡河也。【左思·蜀都賦】戈船掩乎江湖。　又【正字通】皮船，明少保戚繼光濟水法，用生牛馬皮，竹木緣之如箱形，火乾，再用竿繫助之，以浮水。一皮船可乗一人，兩皮船合縫，可乗三人。　又【韻會】衣領曰船。【正字通】俗以船爲襟穿。續演繁露云：杜詩，天子呼來不上船，或言衣襟爲船，誤。按蜀人呼衣繫帶爲穿，俗因改穿作船。又姓。出【姓苑】。　又天船，星名。見【丹元子·步天歌】。　又【集韻】余專切，音沿。義同。　俗作舡，非。

船字的源字形

船字的起名意思

：水上主要运输工具。也表示船帆、船首，船同舟，表示破釜沉舟。

Name meaning
: The main means of transportation on the water. It also means that the sails, bow, and the boat are in the same boat, which means that the boat is in the same boat.

Чуань (фамилия)

船

Значения

Судно, лодка; корабль

Мнемоника

  • Морское судно 舟 для плавания из моря в реку, где её устье 口 дробиться 八 на рукава. По другой версии — большая лодка 舟, рассчитанная не менее, чем на 8 八 персон 口.

  • "Он сказал 口, что эта лодка 舟 может вместить 8 八 человек."

Варианты

舩

Radicals: 舟, ハ, 口  (boat, fins, mouth)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your boat has fins and a mouth! It's still a boat though.
Picture this boat. It's still a boat, but there is a big mouth on the front and it has fins that it paddles forward with.
Reading Mnemonic
This boat belongs to the centaurs (せん). That's probably why you've never seen a boat like it before.
Picture this mouth and boat with a bunch of centaurs riding in it. Centaurs have a lot more parts than humans, so it makes sense that their boats have more parts (animal ones) too.
